CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic devices were fabricated using PFDTBT , PFD2TBT and the ter-polymers as p - type electron donors and by using [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as an n - type acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. "Photovoltaic devices" and "p-type electron donors" and "n-type acceptor" are not material names, but rather descriptions or functions of the materials mentioned.
